name: Christian Legal Aid of Los Angeles (CLA-LA)
address: 333 W. Florence Ave, Inglewood, CA 90301 (This is a listed address, but services are often clinic-based or remote.)
description: Provides free legal services to low-income residents of Los Angeles County, focusing on issues like family law, housing, and bankruptcy. They offer consultations and help clients understand their rights
services: Christian-owned Legal aid in California consultation

name: Christian Legal Aid of Orange County
address: P.O. Box 10713, Santa Ana, CA 92711 (This is a mailing address; clinics are held periodically.)
description: Offers pro bono legal guidance, advice, and counseling to qualifying low-income individuals in Orange County, CA. They hold legal aid clinics at various locations
services: Christian-owned Legal aid in California consultation

name: San Diego Christian Legal Aid (SDCLA)
address: 2244 Faraday Ave, Carlsbad, CA 92008 (This is a listed address; services are clinic-based.)
description: Provides free legal and spiritual counseling by Christian attorneys to needy clients in San Diego County. They operate through several clinic locations
services: Christian-owned Legal aid in California consultation
